title: Anyone Else having Ringtone And Speakerphone issues?
content:
So ... my alert sounds go off from time to time, it's almost like they CHOOSE which ones go off or not.
my speakerphone just does NOT work... unless I plug in the headphones...

my phone wont ring on incoming calls unless I plug in headphones...

Can't play Spotify while I'm cleaning on my phone unless I use headphones...
Whenever I try and contact google pixel about it...
I get these REALLY DUMB solutions that I still try btw... such as ...

-power off the phone and power it back on
-delete phone app cache, uninstall its updates
-COMPLETELY HARD RESET YOUR PHONE [ losing all my data, apps, passwords, pictures blah blah blah]

and surprise surprise... NONE OF IT WORKED! I tried telling them and their response was giving me a user satisfaction survey
